1.content:
Today is your first day as zoo keeper and owner of your own zoo. But since your new in the zoo world you do need publicity to stay in business but how will you do that? You don't even have animals in your zoo yet and the zoo will open with in two days, but as you look in the news paper you notice an article on the front page which said 'celebrities gain more popularity each day' even tho you had no idea why an article like this was considered news you realized what you should do. You came with the idea to transform celebrities into animals for in your zoo, that should help you with getting some publicity. And since you were raised by gypsies and they taught you the art of magic it wouldn't be such a big deal. But how would you do that as most fans would be upset about their favorite celebrity being transformed into an animal. Maybe you know a spell that could help you with that, maybe you could erase their memory about the celebrity but then most people wouldn't notice your zoo since in their eyes the celebrity is just another animal. But maybe you could manage to make them think that their favorite has always been a animal, and if the fans are being a pain you could also make them join their celebrity you thought.

Okay but now let's get to business which celebrity would make a lovely first addition to the zoo...

Though she seemed a little weirded out by her surroundings, Hayley came to greet you with an optimistic smile on her face. She had no idea what was about to happen to her, but in a way, she was going to be helping out a needy cause.

I needed a reason for people to come here, something special that you can't get anywhere else. A few exotic animals may be a start, but what if my attractions were celebrities? Who wouldn't want to see Hayley the Hippo?"

"I'm.... turning into a hippo?" Hayley wondered, staring down at her fat belly as her skin started to turn a darker shade.

The last of the girl's clothes fell to her trotters as she stepped out of them, using her new quadrupedal form for the first time. She was almost finished now, with just her head to go.

Her hair retracted, pulling back into her skull and leaving a wrinkly surface of pink skin behind. It was odd to behold until her bone structure changed shape, losing height and gaining length as her snout became even more prominent. She snorted happily while her cheeks sank in and the last of her human features became as porcine as the rest.

"Oink, oink!" Hayley sounded, plodding towards you and wiggling her plump figure. "What do you think? Am I pig enough for your zoo?"
1551222.title: No, Hayley needs to go full-on pig

info.brief_description: Transform famous celebrities into animals for in your zoo.
info.description:
You become the owner of a brand new zoo, and since your just new in the zoo business you have to find a way to get publicity. And what is a better way to get publicity than transforming already famous people into animals for in your zoo. But how will you do that? Luckily for you were raised by an gypsy family and the taught you the art of magic.

Rules;

Animal tf only

all singers, actors, models and even youtubers can ban be transformed

your allowed to transform fans of the celebrities as well to join the celebrity

Your are able to let them mate but keep it 13+

Your not allowed to kill the celebrities
